TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit AttachedPropertyBrowsableForTypeAttribute extends System.Windows.AttachedPropertyBrowsableAttribute
Public NotInheritable Class AttachedPropertyBrowsableForTypeAttribute Inherits AttachedPropertyBrowsableAttribute

summary.span: Specifies that an attached property is browsable only for elements that derive from a specified type.

span.span: Specifies that an attached property is browsable only for elements that derive from a specified type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一詞的意義`browsable`會用在此描述[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)]類似於提供的描述，附加屬性的可瀏覽狀態是特別針對屬性資訊，但[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)]，附加的屬性主要是因為[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]概念。The meaning of the term `browsable` as used in descriptions for this [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] is analogous to the descriptions given for , but the browsable state for an attached property is particularly relevant to property information for [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)], because an attached property is primarily a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] concept. 如果指定一個以上的類型 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)]，屬性是可瀏覽，如果指定任何型別相符項目 (邏輯或)。If more than one type is specified for a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)], the property is browsable if any specified type matches (logical or). 型別也可以是介面。The type can also be an interface. 這[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)]指定 `true`。This [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] specifies `true`. 這[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)]只會套用在附加的屬性定義的 get 存取子。This [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] should only be applied on the get accessor of attached property definitions. 不適用這[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)]set 存取子。Do not apply this [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] to the set accessor. 雖然直覺的方式是設定作業是由可瀏覽[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]相關的項目，它是目前狀態和 get 存取子的屬性定義控制，則為 true 的行為項目上的特性。Although intuitively it is the set operation that is being made browsable for [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] on relevant elements, it is the presence and characteristics of the get accessor on the property defining element that controls the true behavior. 如需宣告的附加屬性的一般資訊，請參閱[附加屬性概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/attached-properties-overview.md)。For general information on declaring attached properties, see [Attached Properties Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/attached-properties-overview.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此實作會支援這所公開的一個可能可設定值的值相等性[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)]， 。This implementation supports value equality of the one possible settable value exposed by this [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)], .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這項實作支援多個這所公開的一個可能可設定值為基礎的雜湊值[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)]， 。This implementation supports multiple possible hash values based on the one possible settable value exposed by this [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)], .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性是可設定只能透過[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)]所公開的宣告建構函式。This property is settable only via the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] declaration as exposed by the constructor.

span.span: Gets a unique type identifier for this [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)].
An object that is a unique identifier for the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個實作會傳回每個唯一值[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)]，這是因為這[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tla2sharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)]可讓多個使用方式。This implementation returns a unique value for each [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tlasharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)], which is necessary because this [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_netframewkattr](~/includes/tla2sharptla-netframewkattr-md.md)] allows multiple usages.
